wikipedia_page.main: Peter Kirk (1800 – 1 November 1856) was an Irish Conservative Party politician.Kirk was elected Conservative MP for Carrickfergus at the 1835 general election and held the seat until 1847, when he stepped down.He was a member of the Carlton Club.

response: * Peter Kirk (businessman) (1860–1916), British-born American mill-owner, founder of the City of Kirkland, Washington, USA
* Sir Peter Kirk (English politician) (1928–1977), British Conservative MP and government minister
* Peter Kirk (MP for Carrickfergus) (1800–1856), UK MP from the Irish constituency of Carrickfergus 1835–1847
*Peter Kirk, a character in The Grudge
*Peter Kirk, nephew of James T. Kirk in the fictional Star Trek universe
